examples: The big fellow keeps a fish shop near the post office.
The government makes a big thing out of public support.
His dedication and hard work played a big part in the company's success.
The conference attracted many big names in the tech industry.
We're talking big money.
words.defineEn: large or above average in size, amount, degree, etc.
words.defineVi: lớn hoặc trên mức trung bình về kích thước, số lượng, mức độ, v.v.

examples: Such cheap goods obviously rely on dirt cheap labor.
Such cheap goods obviously rely on dirt cheap labor.
It was dirt cheap.
He found a cheap flight deal for his vacation.
She bought cheap headphones, but the sound quality was poor.
The new restaurant is expensive.
The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
She bought an expensive dress for a special occasion.
He bought an expensive watch as a gift for his father.
The restaurant had expensive prices, but the food was delicious.
Sales are growing fast.
Things certainly move fast in the blogosphere.
He takes bends much too fast.
The fast runner won the race by a wide margin.
He's going too fast.
words.defineEn: having a high speed when moving or doing something
words.defineVi: có tốc độ cao khi di chuyển hoặc làm gì đó

examples: I'm finding the advanced physics a bit heavy going.
They pushed the heavy box across the room.
The book is really heavy going at the beginning.
We loaded the heavy boxes onto the truck for transport.
She carried a heavy load of books in her backpack.
words.defineEn: having a lot of weight and not easy to move or pick up
words.defineVi: có nhiều trọng lượng và không dễ di chuyển hoặc nhặt lên

examples: The car ahead of me jumped the light.
The lights changed to green.
Sometimes darkness can show you the light.
A major technological advancement like that is still light years away.
This software first saw the light of day back in 1993.
words.defineEn: having very little weight and easy to move or pick up
words.defineVi: có rất ít trọng lượng và dễ dàng di chuyển hoặc lấy

examples: The library is often quiet during weekdays.
Be quiet, please.
We lead a very quiet life.
Surprisingly, the quiet neighborhood came alive with vibrant festivities during the annual festival.
You've been awfully quiet tonight, honey.
words.defineEn: making very little noise or no noise at all
words.defineVi: tạo ra rất ít tiếng ồn hoặc không có tiếng ồn nào cả

examples: The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.
The slow healing process of the wound required regular care.
The slow elevator took a long time to reach the desired floor.
Our progress has been fairly slow so far, but it's early days.
She had a slow learning pace but never gave up.
words.defineEn: moving, happening, or being done at a speed that is low
words.defineVi: di chuyển, xảy ra hoặc được thực hiện ở tốc độ thấp

examples: Small cracks appeared in the wall.
That holiday cost me a small fortune.
This small restaurant is the best pound for pound in the city.
The whole may be smaller than the sum of its parts!
I gave a small donation.
words.defineEn: little or below average in size, amount, degree, etc.
words.defineVi: ít hoặc dưới mức trung bình về kích thước, số lượng, mức độ, v.v.

examples: You can find bargain books in mint condition at jumble sales.
She knows a bargain when she sees one.
She has a good nose for a bargain.
He drives a hard bargain, but we finally made a deal.
The company is believed to have struck a hard bargain.
words.defineEn: to negotiate the terms and conditions of a contract, sale, or transaction for a better agreement, price, etc.
words.defineVi: để đàm phán các điều khoản và điều kiện của hợp đồng, mua bán hoặc giao dịch để có được một thỏa thuận tốt hơn, giá cả, v.v.

examples: The buyer backed out of the deal the day before they were due to sign the contract.
Sellers have upped the ante in this area so much that first-time buyers can no longer afford it.
Here is why home buyers end up losing their shirt.
The buyers wanted to bring the price down from $15,000 to $10,000, so I offered to meet them halfway at $12,500.
They knew that, as a going concern, the cafe would command a higher price with prospective buyers.
words.defineEn: a person who wants to buy something, usually an expensive item
words.defineVi: một người muốn mua một cái gì đó, thường là một mặt hàng đắt tiền

examples: Language is a window into the world.
The poem uses simple language.
Use plain language instead of jargon.
Don’t use bad language.
The universal language of art is bridging a divide.
words.defineEn: the system of communication by spoken or written words, that is used by people of a particular country or region
words.defineVi: hệ thống giao tiếp bằng lời nói hoặc chữ viết, được sử dụng bởi những người của một quốc gia hoặc khu vực cụ thể

examples: Sellers have upped the ante in this area so much that first-time buyers can no longer afford it.
The book became a worldwide best-seller, largely by the word of mouth.
The goods have to be returned to their rightful owner and getting money back from the seller is like getting blood out of a stone.
Sellers solicit pay-for-play reviews through popular Twitter accounts and Facebook groups with thousands of members.
So this means few sellers.
words.defineEn: a person or company that sells something
words.defineVi: một người hoặc công ty bán một cái gì đó

examples: The father and son spent a delightful afternoon playing catch in the park.
Sailors spend the better part of their time at sea.
Reputable charities spend the lion's share of donations on aid and a tiny fraction on administration.
The couple spent their vacation in a cozy cabin, billing and cooing by the fireplace.
We spent hours building structures with construction toys.
words.defineEn: to use money as a payment for services, goods, etc.
words.defineVi: sử dụng tiền như một khoản thanh toán cho các dịch vụ, hàng hóa, v.v.

examples: We want a deal.
The deal was completely open and above board.
You've got a deal!
Your friendship means a great deal to me.
She got the short end of the stick in the deal.
words.defineEn: to buy, sell, or supply services or goods
words.defineVi: để mua, bán hoặc cung cấp dịch vụ hoặc hàng hóa
